Well, Fritz Zwicky, who is perhaps most famous for coining the term spherical bastards to describe people who are a bastard from any direction, back in the year of the comet was studying the velocities of galaxies in the coma cluster, which is a large nearby cluster of a bazillion galaxies.

MOND is able to fit some stuff better than dark matter models.
